name: World Class Puu Poa #402 Penthouse, A/C, 2  Suites
neighborhood_overview: Princeville is a planned resort community overlooking the Pacific Ocean where lush, green mountains meet crystal-clear waters with beautiful uncrowded beaches.  The resort's centerpiece is its award-winning, 27-hole, championship golf courses.  Shopping opportunities abound in the Princeville Center with everything from a supermarket to art galleries and a full range of services including a bank, activity office, food court and a public library.

name: Studio unit for two @ Royal Garden in Honolulu!
1 BR Condo at Mauna Loa Village Resort
host_about: Hello! After many years of vacation club and property ownership, we have had the opportunity to appreciate how extremely convenient and comfortable these style stays can be for all types of travel. As our family has grown, we've found that we have more than we need and are able to utilize every year which lead us to start offering our properties at a great deal to others! With years of experience, our knowledge has allowed us to help others enjoy their vacations and make life long memories. We've been able to grow the services we offer into a business that now also manages multiple different owners with various types of ownerships!  We are happy to be in a place where we can help both owners and vacationers, so don't hesitate to ask for what you need - even if it is not directly listed! We can often book multiple units and/or offer nearby locations. Booking multiple condos at one of our resorts is one of our favorite ways to get family and friends together. Whether you are celebrating or simply spending time together with friends or family, book with us for your next vacation -  Traveling only expands one's horizons!

name: Perfect Studio Amazing OCEAN View & Resort Perks
Luxury Waikiki Condo with Rare, Private Terrace
neighborhood_overview:
The condominium is located east area in Waikiki.
This area is really closed to the Diamond Head and Kapiolani Park.
The beach is about a 3 min walk.
The closest store is ABC store, which takes about 2 mins walk. You can buy foods, drink, souvenirs etc.
Starbucks coffee is also 3 mins from this condominium.

name: Palm Tree Studio - Beach, A/C, Clean
neighborhood_overview:
Nearby
It is only a 2-minute walk to the Waimānalo’s world class beaches with no need to cross any major roadways or lights to put your toes in the sand. Waimānalo’s Eastern facing beaches and barrier reefs ensure smaller waves and calmer waters than other parts of the island, making for relaxing sun filled days. Take a short stroll to Kalapawai restaurant for an early morning coffee or casual lunch. Kailua town is 15 minutes and is packed with a variety of restaurants including Buzz’s world famous Tiki Bar. Makapu’u Beach Park and lighthouse are just 10 minutes in the other direction providing sunbathing, bodysurfing, paved hiking trails and beautiful views. Sea Life Park Hawaii is also 10 minutes to the South providing a great opportunity to interact with and learn about the Island’s wildlife. For golfers, the world class Royal Hawaiian Golf Club, Olomana Golf Club and Hawaii Kai Golf Club are all short distances away.

neighborhood_overview:
Perched on twenty-six lush acres with breathtaking views of the Pacific Ocean and the islands of Lana'i and Moloka'i, Westin Kaanapali Ocean Resort Villas provides the ultimate in pampering and relaxation. Enjoy an afternoon unwinding beside any of the several lagoon style pools while your children are encouraged to open their minds to new worlds of culture, crafts, and fun at The Westin Discovery Center and pirate ship pool. Experience the luxurious 10,000 square-foot Spa Helani by Westin Heavenly Spa, dedicated to your sense of wellness. Obtain optimal fitness at one of the fully equipped Westin Workout facilities on property. Discover what’s cooking at any one of the three restaurants on property or enjoy indulging gourmet options at either one of the fresh markets.

Beautifully appointed one-bedroom feature fully furnished kitchens, signature Heavenly Beds, Heavenly Baths with a separate whirlpool bath and shower, in–room washer and dryer, and everything you need to cast

name: Remodeled Ocean/Mtn View Mansion with Central A/C
neighborhood_overview:
Located 20 minutes from downtown Honolulu/airport and 20 minutes from the other side of the island and beautiful Lanikai Beach & Kailua.

Lotus on a Hill is favorably located on Kamehame Ridge in Hawaii Kai, which is very close to some of the most beautiful Hawaiian beaches and forest trails on Oahu including Hanauma Bay, Maunalua Bay, and of course, the Koko Crater Trail.

Koko Marina nearby offers dining, shops, a movie theater, fitness center, and access to a wide range of water sports activities. Beyond the neighborhood, you can explore the exquisite natural treasures found along Oahu’s east side, or in 20 minutes you could be in downtown Honolulu, Hawaii’s bustling capital full of premiere restaurants, luxury boutiques and several entertainment venues. Lotus on a Hill is 30 minutes from the Honolulu International Airport.

name: Kailua Townhouse
neighborhood_overview: This is a very quiet, peaceful neighborhood. Please keep noise down to a minimum . My neighbors get up early for work. If your intention is to PARTY and entertain, then please move on
host_about: Honest, Hardworking. I use Air BnB  to supplement my family's income.

name: Dreamy Beach, Stunning Views, Amazing! OCEAN FRONT
neighborhood_overview:
There are only a few homes nestled On the mountain side and a few on the Bay. At night just a few lights from the homes twinkle danceing across the water.
Are 2 gates to go through before arriving at the property which gives you extra security. A safe family friendly neighborhood.
host_about: I love adventure there so many wonderful activities to do on this Beautiful island. There is no other place like it on earth. We are always trying to discover little secret beaches. My wife and I love to hike the Pali Coast, surf or just hang out at the amazing beach’s and bask in the sun. We especially love Molooa Bay a in crowded beach Sometimes I’m looking out beautiful Bay and see spinning dolphins. what a sight that is. we just love riding our bikes along the ocean coastal path in Kapaa. And enjoy eating out at wonderful restaurants . All over the island. Kauai is Heaven Sent!

name: Coconut Beach Cottage - 2 bed A/C
neighborhood_overview: It is only a 2-minute walk to the Waimānalo’s world class beaches with no need to cross any major roadways or lights to put your toes in the sand.  Waimānalo’s Eastern facing beaches and barrier reefs ensure smaller waves and calmer waters than other parts of the island, making for relaxing sun-filled days. Take a short stroll to Kalapawai restaurant for an early morning coffee or casual lunch. Kailua town is 15 minutes and is packed with a variety of restaurants including Buzz’s world famous Tiki Bar. Makapu’u Beach Park and lighthouse are just 10 minutes in the other direction providing sunbathing, bodysurfing, paved hiking trails and beautiful views. Sea Life Park Hawaii is also 10 minutes to the South providing a great opportunity to interact with and learn about the Island’s wildlife. For golfers, the world class Royal Hawaiian Golf Club, Olomana Golf Club and Hawaii Kai Golf Club are all short distances away.

name: Blue Dragon Hot Yoga Homestead
neighborhood_overview: Kalapana-Seaview is a diverse neighborhood of families, homesteaders, and people choosing to leave the mainland for an alternative way of living.  We are quirky, innovative, artistic, free-thinkers!  The lots in Seaview are 1/5 an acre each, which offers a tight-knit community vibe.  We have the blessing of sharing two community parks, including “The Lawn”, which is a huge grassy space overlooking the ocean.  We are 5 minutes from Kehena black sand beach, 20 minutes from Pohoiki’s geothermally-heated hot ponds, 1 hour south of Hilo, and about 2-3 hours from Kona.

name: Kahala Ocean Heart
neighborhood_overview: Kahala is about 15 minutes away from Waikiki.  You will be staying in a serene neighborhood, an upscale residential area composed of mansion-like houses. You will have access to quiet beaches along the Kahala coast and short 10 min walks to grocery stores, restaurants and convenient shopping at Kahala Mall. You will be near Wai‘alae Country Club and the Kahala Hotel & Resort which is known for world-class spa and dining options. Kahala is known to serve as vacation housing for celebrities and business moguls. A safe neighborhood for the whole family.

host_about:
Hawaii Beach Homes is a boutique agency that offers reservations for a small selection of beach front rentals on the beautiful island of Oahu.  

Hawaii Beach Homes is a travel agency licensed in the state of Hawaii. We specialize in booking beach homes for visitors, and are not a property management company. We carefully select each property we reserve for our clients. Our staff is familiar with every house, beach, and neighborhood on Oahu, and we love nothing more than helping you choose the perfect spot. We understand that a trip to Hawaii is an experience of a life time for many of our guests.  Our goal is to ensure that you feel truly at home while in Hawaii and to assist you in experiencing true Aloha.

name: Hyatt Residence Club Ka'anapali 2BR Ocean View
Cute Laie Bungalow near the beach w/AC |30 days*
neighborhood_overview:
Near the beach. The Beach is protected by a reef a ways out so it's perfect for snorkeling without the bigger waves. Beaches with big waves are nearby! Shrimp Truck, Thai Food Truck, Burger Food Truck, Vietnamese Pho Food Truck, Hawaiian Ice stand and convenience store with local food counter are nearby!

Near the Polynesian Cultural Center, Hawaii’s #1 paid attraction, draws millions of visitors annually with their world-class entertainment, learning, shows, and luaus. There is a Longs drugstore and two grocery stores in the area. Five minutes away, Laie Beach Park has great year round larger waves for body surfing. Turtle Bay Resort Golf Courses/Restaurants and World Famous North Shore Surfing Beaches a short drive away.

If it's winter, along the North Shore you'll be treated to 30 to 40-foot tall waves and some of the world's best surfers. You'll also find Waimea Bay and the beautiful Waimea Falls Park with its sacred sites, waterfall and wonderful hula dance

name: Private Kailua Paradise w/ pool
neighborhood_overview: We live in in Beachside Kailua.  A community of Kailua that is so close to the ocean that it is where it gets its name.  When you walk out of our driveway it is a 3-minute walk to the beach with no busy roads that you need to worry about.  You'll be on Castles beach for sunrise at 6:30 am most mornings.  Take a couple of our bikes to the village 10-minute cycle or a 3-5 minute drive and there will be all types of restaurants, bars, and local shops.  There are several farmer's markets to check out in town and across the road from us as well as local grocery and take out spots a short walk away.  In 20 minutes you can get to Honolulu where there is more action. The drive feels like you're in Jurrasic Park without the T-Rex.  Honolulu has Waikiki and high-end shopping.  Kailua is on the lusher, quieter side of the island, with a real Aloha local feel.  Relax by the turquoise water and fine soft sand beaches!
host_about: Traveling with Wife and often 2 children - ages 13 &15.  Well traveled, 50+ countries for both my wife and I.

name: Thanksgiving Westin Kaanapali Resort 2 Bdrm villa
Papa'aloa Animal Lovers' Paradise #2
neighborhood_overview: This is an 11-acre farm/ranch, surrounded by similar properties.  The post office and store are just across the highway a short distance down the hillside.  There is a nearby gas station/convenience store and a beach park a very miles away.  There are other attractions and sight-seeing opportunities in both directions.
host_about:
I'm a single retired police detective from Oahu. For 16 years I offered horseback rides on Oahu, but moved to the Big Island with my horses when the ranch lease recently expired. 

Originally from the Midwest, I did a stint in the military, which brought me to the islands in 1978.  My education includes an AA in Foreign Languages, a BA in Psychology and completion of a Master's program in Guidance & Counseling. 
 
I'm a Christian, who believes the good Lord brought me to this fantastic place.
I love the serene beauty and quiet of this location, and since the house is much larger than one person needs, wish to share it with traveling guests,  who will also enjoy its comfort and fabulous views.  Besides that, the horses still "eat like horses", even though they are no longer earning their keep!

As a pet lover, I would prefer folks who also like animals.  Because I have so many, I don't have a chance to travel much, although in the past I did get the opportunity to visit Spain, France, Switzerland  and England.  I was stationed in Florida & CA as well as Hawaii while in the military.   

I enjoy a variety of books and movies, preferably well-written and thought-provoking.  A good comedy is always appreciated, as well.  My social life now is mostly a weekly ladies' luncheon and music nights at the Fifties Café.

neighborhood_overview: The house is 1 across the street from beach access. The neighborhood right between Haleiwa and Waimea bay with easy access to Honolulu. It is simple country living, few houses, and beach lifestyle.
host_about: My Mantra is having a positive attitude and customer first. worked out well for me so far

name: April Sale Steps 2 Beach! NO TAX! Oceanview Condo!
host_about: Aloha, my name is Josh. Manu is the Hawaiian word for Bird, which is my family name. I grew up in the area, so if you have any questions, whatsoever, let me know and ill be happy to share my local knowledge.

name: North Shore Paradise Home
neighborhood_overview:
Waialua is a country town located on the North Shore of Oahu. This former sugarcane plantation town has generations of families living and working on the North Shore and is a small tight knit community.

Just a short 40 min drive from the Honolulu International Airport.

Waialua and the North Shore are home to some of the world’s most beautiful beaches.

We are located just a short 5 min. drive to some of the most isolated beaches on the island and within 10 miles of some of the best surfing spots in the world (during the winter) and some of the best places for snorkeling and swimming (during the summer).

We are also less then 10 min away from Mokuleia Beach which is one of the best kitesurfing spots on the island.

There are several small restaurants and shops in Haleiwa Town, 5 min away by car and home to the world famous Matsumoto Shave Ice.

There are numerous restaurants, shops, coffee shops, surf shops and grocery s

name: Swim with the Turtles!
neighborhood_overview: Honu house is located two miles from the entrance to historic Haleiwa. The town of Haleiwa is a safe and family friendly community filled with local restaurants, food trucks, cafes and boutiques. You are two miles down the street from the rainforest and waterfall at Waimea. Nearby activities are endless, the highlights include excellent hiking trails, snorkeling, stand up paddling, eco – friendly shark tours, zip – lining, yoga on the beach, spa services, golfing, farmers markets, and luau’s at the Polynesian Cultural Center. The nearest grocery store and a farmers market is a few miles away, the nearest farmers market is 2 miles.

Our goal is to ensure that you feel truly at home while in Hawaii and to assist you in experiencing true Aloha.

name: Portlock Paradise
neighborhood_overview: The Neighborhood -  This home is located in Hawaii Kai in the  upscale residential neighborhood of Portlock, a short distance from Waikiki.  Nearby are all the conveniences needed, including Whole Foods and Costco, drug stores, casual dining, upscale restaurants and local boutiques. Haunama Bay is a few minutes down the street for snorkeling, other nearby activities include hiking, parasailing, jet skiing, hang gliding, and golfing. The home is located close to major highway access so is a convenient starting point for day trips. Waikiki is 7 miles away, the airport is 13 miles, and Pearl Harbor 16 miles.
host_about:
Hawaii Beach Homes is a boutique agency that offers reservations for a small selection of beach front rentals on the beautiful island of Oahu.  

Hawaii Beach Homes is a travel agency licensed in the state of Hawaii. We specialize in booking beach homes for visitors, and are not a property management company. We carefully select each property we reserve for our clients. Our staff is familiar with every house, beach, and neighborhood on Oahu, and we love nothing more than helping you choose the perfect spot. We understand that a trip to Hawaii is an experience of a life time for many of our guests.  Our goal is to ensure that you feel truly at home while in Hawaii and to assist you in experiencing true Aloha.

neighborhood_overview: The ocean view from the middle and high floors has a stunning view of the Hawaiian Blue sea and sky
host_about: こんにちは。私はHITOSHI KAMBARA(蒲原均:かんばらひとし）と申します。現在、札幌市に在住しております。41年務めた会社を65歳で退職して、すぐに起業し、コンサルティング会社の経営を行っております。前の会社ではビジネスでヨーロッパ、北米、東南アジアを旅行しました。2019年に初めて休暇でハワイに行き、マリオットコオリナビーチクラブ尋ねた時、ワイキキとは違った美しい自然と時間がゆっくり流れるような心の安らぎを感じ、タイムシェアのオーナーになりました。皆さんも大切なご家族、ご友人と一緒に癒しの時間をお過ごしください。

Our unit as well our pool and beach facilities are keyless, making life easier. Lots of green areas and beautiful walk patches throughout the Village. Children friendly.

name: Ocean Sun-Ocean Breeze combo: 2bdrm/2ba
host_about: We live here on Oahu and have enjoyed hosting vacationers and locals alike at Tiki Moon Villas for over 10 years. We enjoy traveling, hiking and the ocean.....living next to one is a blessing we are grateful for every day, and we love sharing that with our guests.

name: Luxurious Beachfront Condo in Honolulu!
neighborhood_overview:
This lovely condo is located next door to the world-famous Kahala Hotel & Resort and is located in an extremely safe neighbourhood. You will be able to access and enjoy the same secluded beach as the resort/spa without the hustle and bustle you experience at the Waikiki beach. The hotel has some of the best restaurants on the island for your elegant dining experience as well as a lounge, dolphin pool and a luxurious spa. Situated directly across from the Waialea Country Club and Golf course, the home of the PGA Sony Open each year, this property is truly breathtaking.

This condominium complex is a historic piece of land where Jack Lord from the glory days of Hawaii Five-O used to call home and was his permanent residence for some time. In case you'd like to do some shopping then you're only a 5 minute drive away from the infamous Waikiki Beach and Kalakaua Avenue where you'll be able to shop till you drop.

In addition, the Kahala Mall is a mere 3 minute drive or
host_about: Helping connect guests to the island of Oahu!

name: Four Seasons Hualalai 5 br/5Ba Ocean Estate
neighborhood_overview: Waiulu Street is the most desirable location for houses at the Four Seasons, Hualalai. The lower end of the street (where this estate is located) closest to the ocean and the private members' Canoe Club, is home to a number of exceptional properties.
host_about: British, living in California.

name: Bali-Hai Resort 2 Bedroom

name: Pickleball Paradise: Quiet 2BD/1BA & Private Court
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is a lovely quiet neighborhood with a small beach and water access to Kaneohe Bay where you can easily put your kayak or standup paddle board in the water and go around coconut island or even the sandbar. Close to restaurants, shops, the Windward mall, He’eia harbor, Kaneohe Yacht Club, golf courses, Kaneohe District Park (with a pool, tennis, pickleball and basketball courts), MCBH and freeways.
host_about: This property is hosted by Tim Steers & Ana–Maria Contis. Tim grew up in Oregon and Ana-Maria in Romania. Since 2015 they have been blessed by being able to call Hawaii home. They got married in 2012 and for their honeymoon they went to Puerto Rico and stayed in someone's home for the first time. They had such a great experience! It inspired them to re-create it for you when you choose to stay with them.

name: *Luxury Gated beachfront in town
host_about: Aloha and Welcome to KonaHome Vacation.   This is Emmy.  I am the owner and manager of these lovely vacation rentals in Kailua-Kona.  I was the software engineer and the entrepreneur in Silicon Valley for over 20 years.  I purchased my 1st oceanfront house in Kona in 2013,  I moved to Hawaii from San Jose in 2016.  Now I own 5 beautiful vacation homes.  We have the best team works KonaHome to provide the quality services for our guests.

name: Kona Hawaiian Resort 2 Bedroom, Full Kitchen, w/d
Close to Kahala Beach, Waikiki, and Kahala Mall
neighborhood_overview: Our accommodation is a fully furnished detached studio (approximately 570 sq. ft.) with a large private pool.  It is air conditioned with a large ceiling fan.   The neighborhood is perfect for jogging and walking.  Kahala Beach is a small secluded white sand beach 3 blocks down the street,where you can enjoy spectacular sunrises. Please bring your fishing rod.  Walk a mile to Kahala Mall which features high quality stores, including Apple, Whole Foods, Macy's, Town and Country Surf Shop, Planet Fitness and many local gift shops. without hoards of tourists.  The Mall also hosts local, and international restaurants, including California Pizza Kitchen, Jersey Mike's,  Genki Sushi and Patties' Chinese Kitchen.  The bus stop is three blocks down the street and can take you around the island, or just to high end Waikiki tourist shops, the Honolulu Zoo, the Aquarium and safe surf and body surfing beaches.  Or spend a day basking at Queen's or Kaimana Beach.  Public bicycle rental stalls are l

name: Kamani Tree home in Kailua Kona
neighborhood_overview: Kimani tree is a safe neighborhood in the heart of Kailua Kona. Conveniently located but also very peaceful with almost no through traffic with the exception of neighbors. We ask that you take the time to drive slow as this is a very child friendly neighborhood.

name: Maui Banyan Vacation Club
host_about:
My husband and I enjoy traveling the world together, seeing the sights and learning about other cultures.
We recently bought into a vacation club and want to share the luxurious resorts we have access to. We are currently only advertising Cabo San Lucas, but please reach out if there are any other locations you wish to visit. We have easy access to 7 resorts in Mexico.

name: Oceanfront home with sweeping views!
neighborhood_overview: Beautiful oceanfront street in a country setting!   Well maintained homes and friendly neighbors. A great street to do your daily walk or run with constant ocean breezes.

name: Ko Olina, Sand, Sea, with Private Yard
neighborhood_overview:
Located in the Fairway Villa's
Beautiful private backyard overlooking the golf course. Walking distance to the community pool and hot tub.
Fairway Villa's are a nice morning walk to the lagoons or a golf cart ride away.
host_about:
We live in Carson City about 20 minutes from Lake Tahoe.

We have a bit of paradise to share with you in Ko Olina, Hawaii.
It is such a special place, and we hope you will come stay in our place there and just fall in love with the area.

name: Condo in Kaneohe

Brad and Maria

name: 2 Bedroom Condo at Kona Hawaiian Resort
host_about: Hello! After many years of vacation club and property ownership, we have had the opportunity to appreciate how extremely convenient and comfortable these style stays can be for all types of travel. As our family has grown, we've found that we have more than we need and are able to utilize every year which lead us to start offering our properties at a great deal to others! With years of experience, our knowledge has allowed us to help others enjoy their vacations and make life long memories. We've been able to grow the services we offer into a business that now also manages multiple different owners with various types of ownerships!  We are happy to be in a place where we can help both owners and vacationers, so don't hesitate to ask for what you need - even if it is not directly listed! We can often book multiple units and/or offer nearby locations. Booking multiple condos at one of our resorts is one of our favorite ways to get family and friends together. Whether you are celebrating or simply spending time together with friends or family, book with us for your next vacation -  Traveling only expands one's horizons!

name: Westin Kaanapali resort life!
neighborhood_overview:
Perched on twenty-six lush acres with breathtaking views of the Pacific Ocean and the islands of Lana'i and Moloka'i, Westin Kaanapali Ocean Resort Villas (commonly referred to as WKORV) provides the ultimate in pampering and relaxation. Enjoy an afternoon unwinding beside any of the several lagoon style pools while your children are encouraged to open their minds to new worlds of culture, crafts, and fun at The Westin Discovery Center and pirate ship pool. Experience the luxurious 10,000 square-foot Spa Helani by Westin Heavenly Spa, dedicated to your sense of wellness. Obtain optimal fitness at one of the fully equipped Westin Workout facilities on property. Discover what’s cooking at any one of the three restaurants on property or enjoy indulging gourmet options at either one of the fresh markets.

name: Studio with island view on oceanfront property
neighborhood_overview:
From slipping your toes into the sand of a blissful beach or spotting humpback whales rising from the sea to hiking a tropical rainforest to a 400-foot waterfall or exploring a dormant volcano’s summit, there’s no better place than the island paradise of Maui to elevate your vacation experience.

Miles of sapphire-blue Pacific waters beckon beginner and expert surfers alike, while scores of emerald-green courses entice golfers to unforgettable games. And no visit is complete without taking in the beauty and diversity of Polynesian culture as told through the music, dance, and cuisine of an authentic Hawaiian lū‘au.
host_about: Architect and mom. I love experiences and memories more than anything. Exploring a new place and making new food for my family to enjoy brings me so much happiness!

neighborhood_overview: Our condo is located right on the beach in the tropical country side of Oahu in the small town of Punaluu. It's near the world famous surf beaches of the North Shore and there are tons of great food trucks and other places to eat in walking distance.

host_about:
Hawaii Beach Homes is a boutique agency that offers reservations for a small selection of beach front rentals on the beautiful island of Oahu.  

Hawaii Beach Homes is a travel agency licensed in the state of Hawaii. We specialize in booking beach homes for visitors, and are not a property management company. We carefully select each property we reserve for our clients. Our staff is familiar with every house, beach, and neighborhood on Oahu, and we love nothing more than helping you choose the perfect spot. We understand that a trip to Hawaii is an experience of a life time for many of our guests.  Our goal is to ensure that you feel truly at home while in Hawaii and to assist you in experiencing true Aloha.

name: Marriott’s Ko Olina Beach Club 2BR Villa w/Kitchen
neighborhood_overview:
**Marriott's Ko Olina Beach Club: A Tropical Paradise**

Nestled on the stunning western shores of Oahu, Marriott's Ko Olina Beach Club offers an idyllic escape where natural beauty meets luxurious comfort. Located just 30 minutes from Honolulu, this resort provides a peaceful retreat away from the bustling city, while still offering easy access to Oahu's famous attractions.

**Location & Scenery**
Set within the exclusive Ko Olina Resort community, the Marriott Ko Olina Beach Club is surrounded by pristine landscapes and breathtaking views. The resort is framed by lush, green mountains on one side and the sparkling waters of the Pacific Ocean on the other. Guests can explore the resort's four private lagoons, where soft sandy beaches and gentle waves create a perfect setting for relaxation. Sunsets here are spectacular, painting the sky with hues of orange and pink, making for an unforgettable experience every evening.

**Amenities**
Marriott's

host_about:
Aloha! This term is what our family (ohana) is built from. To give, to host, to love, to share.
We are a family of four and would like to spread aloha, both by traveling and sharing what we have. 
Our house is our home, but a home away form home for others to enjoy. From toys for girls and boys to beach supplies and every kitchen essential. We've got you covered! Steps away from a world class beach (Kailua Beach) along with a pool with a spa and waterfall. Drive a few miles to stores and resturants.

host_about: I had a happy exciting childhood, great parents, adored my dad who inspired me to try things, taught me to build things, plant things, and be creative.  He always said "Imagination is more important than Intelligence" like Einstein said, and anyone can spend money to make things look nice. If you can take something no longer usefull that is trash and make it functional again, that is genuine art and skill. I spent my entire life doing just that.
